# debugDescription

**Instance Property**

A textual representation of the size’s dimensions.

## Declaration

```swift
var debugDescription: String { get }
```

## Alternate Representations

- **customMirror**: A representation of the size’s structure and display style for use in debugging.

## From Protocol

- CustomDebugStringConvertible

items.description: A representation of the size’s structure and display style for use in debugging.
items.name: customMirror
